segments.text: I notice the water is pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely unaware of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet and sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't tip over and cause a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are going to make a lot of noise soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so calm and lovely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
